text:
Hi,
Can anyone tell me how can I add a new font-family for my HubSpot webpage
add <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#font|this field> to a module or a theme’s `field.json` file

If it's a Google font, they're all included in every theme. If it's an Adobe(or something else with a include-link) font you can put the include link directly into your css or you can place the regular "script"-tag into the template and use it in your css. If you want/need to host it locally you can upload them to the File-Manager and go the @font-face route in your css

Do any developers here use HubSpot for their own blog or website? I built a Gatsby site but I don’t really want to maintain it. I’m considering using <http://dev.to|dev.to> or medium. Im not sure it’s worth it if I don’t plan on monetizing my content.
Hi team! Who knows how to add a *tag filter* to *custom search* modules? :eyes::i_love_you_hand_sign:
